subject: Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Nastia Liukin, the Olympic all-around gold medalist, was honored as the Women’s Sports Foundation’s Individual Sportswoman of the Year. Jessica Mendoza, a softball player, was honored as Team Sportswoman of the Year at the foundation’s 29th Annual Salute to Women in Sports.
